trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While Steel Crane is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, his AC includes his Wisdom modifier.

action.name: Force Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) force damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the start of Steel Crane's next turn.

action.name: Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) slashing damage or, if the target is a creature, Steel Crane can grapple the target instead (escape {@dc 15}). Steel Crane can't make attacks with the whip while using it to grapple a creature. Anytime on his turn, he can release a creature {@condition grappled} by the whip (no action required).

action.name: Heal Self (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: Steel Crane regains {@dice 2d8 + 4} hit points, and all levels of {@condition exhaustion} end on him.

reaction.name: Deflect Missile
entries: In response to being hit by a ranged weapon attack, Steel Crane deflects the missile. The damage he takes from the attack is reduced by {@dice 1d10 + 10}. If the damage is reduced to 0, Steel Crane catches the missile if it's small enough to hold in one hand and Steel Crane has a hand free.

reaction.name: Slow Descent (3/Day)
entries: When Steel Crane falls, he can slow his descent, taking no damage from the fall.
